data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Behan-Pelletier, Valerie M. (2017): Tegoribatidae of North America, with proposal of Protectoribates gen. nov., and new species (Acari, Oribatida, Tegoribatidae). Zootaxa 4337 (2), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4337.2.1|14 occurrences
